document_data.caption: Rimmen of the Scarlet Eye.
document_data.name: Rimmen of the Scarlet Eye
document_data.mainbody: '''Rimmen of the Scarlet Eye''' was a [[magelord]] who carried himself with the attitude of those who practiced the same magic in [[Athalantar]]; that is, one of supremacy through magical might. He particularly enjoyed showing off with his arcane skill to intimidate others.
document_data.Possessions:
Among Rimmen's possessions were a ''[[amulet of natural armor]]'', a pair of ''[[bracers of armor]] +3'', a [[dusty rose ioun stone]], a pair of ''[[gloves of dexterity]] +2'', a [[headband of intellect]], two ''[[pearl of power|pearls of power]]'', a [[ring of counterspells|''ring of counterspells'']], and a ''+1'' [[shortsword]].

In addition, he was known to possess a [[scroll]] of ''[[clairaudience/clairvoyance]]'', a scroll of ''[[false life]]'', a scroll of ''[[minor creation]]'', a [[potion]] of ''[[cure moderate wounds]]'', and two potions of ''[[cure light wounds]]''.
